meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

editorialNote.content: The title of this Order was amended from “Designation of Libraries (Urban Council Area) Order” to “Designation of Libraries Order” — see 78 of 1999 s. 7.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of libraries
section.content: The premises described in the Schedule hereto are designated as libraries.

section.name: s1
section.content: The ground floor, second to sixth floors, and eighth to eleventh floors (excluding the staircase, the floor lobby on each floor and the recital hall on the eighth floor) of the building known as City Hall High Block situated at Edinburgh Place, Hong Kong.

section.content: Block A of the ground floor of, and the first to third floors of, No. 251, Shanghai Street, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon. (L.N. 64 of 2020)
